mechanics.condition: Target is a willing creature AND Target is touched
mechanics.outcome: Target gains the ability to roll 1d4 and add it to an ability check ONCE before the spell ends

mechanics.trigger: Before or after making an Ability Check
mechanics.condition: Target chooses to use the Guidance effect AND Guidance effect has not been used yet
mechanics.outcome: Target rolls 1d4 and adds the number rolled to the Ability Check result

mechanics.trigger: After target uses the Guidance effect

description_text: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.
